data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kâmpóng Cham with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 112 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, the believers in the state of Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 336 new simple churches in the state of Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,680,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Han Chinese, Cantonese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Kâmpóng Cham, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Kâmpóng Cham.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kâmpóng Cham, Cambodia has a population of 1,680,700.

We estimate Kâmpóng Cham has 34,375 people who might know Jesus, 23,338 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,622,987 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 34,375 believers in the state of Kâmpóng Cham to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
